extendedInfo.description: Shows and updates lottery results for over 325 lotteries worldwide.  Track multiple lotteries easily. Features:Results for 335 lotteriesChoose which lotteries to follow with Country and Lottery FilterLottery Results HistoryIncludes:USA:     Every lottery - including prize draw values.  We also have Powerball and Mega MillionsUK:       National Lottery, UK Powerball and UK Lotto Plus 5Canada:649, Lotto Max, National, Quebec 49, Western 649, BC 49,Ontario 49, Atlantic 49, Bucko, Tag, Banco, BC Extra, Keno Atlantic,La Mini, La Quotidienne 3 & 4, Lottario, Ontario Pick 3 & 4, Pik-4, Quebec Extra, Quebec Payday, TRIplex, Western Extra, Western Payday, Western Pick 3Australia:Oz Lotto, Powerball, Saturday Lotto, Wednesday LottoEurope: Euro MillionsBelgium:Lotto, Keno, Pick 3Finland:LottoFrance:Loto, Jackpit, Joker, KenoGermany:Lotto (6/49), Super 6, Spiel 77Greece:LottoIreland:Lotto, Monday Million, Monday Million Plus, Lotto Plus, All or NothingItaly:SiVince Tutto, SuperEnalottoPoland:LottoRomania:LottoSpain:BonoLoto, Primitiva Jueves,Primitiva Sabado, Gordo de la Primitiva, Loteria del Jueves, Loteria NacionalSweden:Lotto and Viking LottoAsia:Japan Loto 6Hong Kong Mark 6New Zealand PowerballOther Regions:Israel Double Lotto and New LottoSouth Africa Lotto, National Lotto, Plus Lottery, PowerballTurkey Lotto 649, Super Lotto 654

reviews.title: I like it, but needs work
reviews.comment: Incorrect Irish results 13th Feb......don\'t rely on them being 100% correct.
reviews.author: Rob Brighouse

reviews.title: Useful app
reviews.comment: Only issue with this app is that you cannot add lotteries without re-installing
reviews.author: Ted Kemp

reviews.comment: Does not have all the results for South Africa
reviews.author: Sean Packham

reviews.title: Calling it an app is a joke
reviews.comment: Selected the lotteries I wished to follow and said I needed to select at least one lottery when I had 3 ticked. Also painfully slow.  At least the ads loaded properly
reviews.author: Anthony Cox

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Has potential, only has Saturday lotto for nz not big weds. Also not clear which is bonus ball, which is power ball.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it does not WORKING most of countries waste og time and data

reviews.title: Crappy app. !
reviews.comment: Crapolllla app. Waste of my time.
